content: In my messages that I send you later, I will refer to this information as Information About Myself. Here is a bit of information about myself that I want you to know. I am a solicitor and construction lawyer with more than 10 years experience specialising in construction law. I regularly advise homeowners and builders regarding their contractual and legal rights. I represent homeowners and builders in NSW, Australia as well as all courts of competent jurisdiction. I have advised homeowners, builders, and contractors experience regarding latent conditions. I have advised them on their contract rights, risks and obligations. I have negotiated and amended contracts to reflect their intentions.
